opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Caspari, Superintendent, Missouri Eastern Correctional Center v. McIntyre

opinion:
510 U.S. 939

Caspari, Superintendent, Missouri Eastern Correctional Center, et al.
v.
McIntyre.

No. 92-1465.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 1, 1993.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 8th Cir.

2

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Dixon, 509 U. S. 688 (1993). Reported below: 975 F. 2d 437.
